string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- Revamped "Playback Speed", "Sleep Timer", and "New Playlist" dialogs with a modern, edge-to-edge design. 
 - The new "Playback Speed" dialog features a precise slider (0.25x to 8.0x), increase/decrease buttons, and quick-select presets. 
 - Introduced new UI components like `TonalIconButton` for better visual affordance. 
 - Refined various UI elements, including button styles and dialog corner radiuses, for a softer, more consistent look. 
 - Improved artwork fetching logic to prevent incorrect caching of missing embedded art. 
 - Enabled Gradle configuration cache to improve build performance.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
